title: Avengers Age Of Ultron 2015 1080p BRRip x265 HEVC 12bit - zsewdc
description:
Avengers Age Of Ultron 2015 1080p BRRip x265 HEVC 12bit - zsewdc

No Cropping Dimensions
Maybe this isn't compatible with the VLC 2.2.1 and earlier for now.


How to Play
If you want to play it smoothly, you need to use the device/PC at least a dual-core processor.
You should update your player to the latest version.
Many of the latest player to have native support for codecs.

Install K-Lite Codec Pack latest version and use MPC-HC players is recommended (Windows).

To play on Android, use the MX Player.

To play on Ubuntu (15.04 - 14.10 - 14.04 - 13.10 - 12.04) and derivatives system,
You have to install gstreamer0.10-libde265 gstreamer1.0-libde265 packages which are available via some third party PPA.
Or, you can install the vlc-plugin-libde265 plugin if you want to use VLC.

For GNU/Linux using MPV players is recommended.
